h3_title: Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - Gore-Eye Daoist
content: One of these blood spells is to basically turn his staff into a firehose, and he’ll spray blood in a frontal arc around him to force you to back off, creating several new pools at his feet. Depending on your positioning, you can either try to dodge behind him, or take a retreating jump and follow up with the thrust stance heavy attack outside of his range.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Yellow_Sand_Formation_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Yellow Sand Formation Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Windseal Gate' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - Gore-Eye Daoist'.
The content is as follows:
One of these blood spells is to basically turn his staff into a firehose, and he’ll spray blood in a frontal arc around him to force you to back off, creating several new pools at his feet. Depending on your positioning, you can either try to dodge behind him, or take a retreating jump and follow up with the thrust stance heavy attack outside of his range.
